name: StatMuse
0:
”Alexa, ask StatMuse, how many touchdowns did Peyton Manning have in 2007?”
”What about passing yards?”
”How many three pointers has Steph Curry made this season?”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: statmuse
Developer Terms of Use
des:
StatMuse lets you explore sports statistics, schedules and scores in a whole new way, straight from your favorite players and personalities. Say "Alexa, ask StatMuse who has the most career receiving yards?" and hear Jerry Rice tell you about his record. Then try "Who had the most touchdowns in 2018?" to hear from Todd Gurley. Ask "How did Devonta Freeman do?" to have him give you a recap.

StatMuse provides instant answers to your NBA, NFL, MLB, NHL & PGA questions and features the authentic voices of Peyton Manning, Le'Veon Bell, Drew Brees, Terrell Owens, Jerry Rice and other players, plus Scott Van Pelt and Joe Buck. StatMuse is the officially licensed AI of the NFL Players Association.

Start by asking:
"Alexa, open StatMuse..."

"How did the Eagles do?"
"Who had the most passing yards in a season?"
After hearing Peyton Manning answer, ask "Where did you go to college?" or "How many touchdowns did you have in your career?"

"Who won the World Series in 1945?"
"Which pitcher had the most strikeouts last year?"
After hearing the answer, ask "What is his career ERA?"

"How did Steph Curry do last season?"
"Who do the Rockets play this week?"

"Give me stats for The Great One."
"Tell me about the Golden Knights."

StatMuse has comprehensive stats going back to 1947 for the NBA, 1920 for the NFL, 1876 for MLB and 1917 for the NHL.

Here are just a few of the stats now available to you, instantly: https://www.statmuse.com/product/examples
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
